mapper.insert: insert into food_member (userid, pwd, username, nickname, userbirthday, email, agree) values(#{userid}, #{pwd}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{userbirthday}, #{email}, #{agree})
mapper.select: select count(*) from food_member where userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from food_member_like where userid = #{userid} and cid=#{cid}
